dublin_core.dcvalue: A method of designing a plastic zoom lens with a diffractive refractive hybrid corrector comprising one diffractive lens and one refractive lens is described The efficiency of this method is demonstrated by designing a compact zoom lens for a mobile phone This zoom design incorporating lenses made only of two commercial optical plastics polymethylmethacrylate and polycarbonate provides high optical performance
Diffractive-refractive correction units for plastic compact zoom lenses.
